```
spring:
  cloud:
    vault:
      uri: https://localhost:8200
      ssl:
        trust-store: classpath:/vault.jks
        trust-store-password: changeit
  config:
    import: vault:// 
```

```
spring:
  cloud:
    vault:
      # other vault properties omitted ...
      generic:
        enabled: true
        application-name: fakebank 
```

```
spring:
  cloud:
    vault:
      # ... other properties omitted
      database:
        enabled: true
        role: fakebank-accounts-rw
```
